snippet.title: Why You Should Use Wordpress
snippet.description:
Why You Should Use Wordpress To Make Your Website

go to https://www.hostinger.com/kalle and use the code “KALLE” to get up to 91% OFF yearly web hosting plans.

MY NEW SITE: https://kalletech.com/

This video is meant to showcase how easy it is to make a website using Wordpress. To show that right now there are more benefits to using Wordpress for your websites than to coding your own. Especially since you are able to customise your site by adding in your own html and css here and there. It just saves you the trouble of having to build certain tedious things out yourself.

THEME I used: https://siteorigin.com/theme/unwind/

CONTACT: halldenkalle@gmail.com

Follow me on:

TWITCH: https://www.twitch.tv/kallehallden
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/kallehallden/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/kallehallden
GITHUB: https://github.com/kallehallden


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
